# Phalcon PHP Framework Project with Docker

## Project Overview
This is a Phalcon PHP framework project configured to run with Docker, Nginx, and MySQL.

## Development Guidelines
- Follow PSR-12 coding standards for PHP
- Use Phalcon's MVC architecture
- Keep controllers thin, move business logic to models
- Use environment variables for sensitive configuration

## Project Structure
- `app/` - Application code (controllers, models, views, config)
- `public/` - Web root with index.php
- `docker/` - Docker configuration files
- `composer.json` - PHP dependencies
